scripts.release: standard-version --release-as patch -a -t "v" --releaseCommitMessageFormat "chore(release): v{{currentTag}}" && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:major: standard-version --release-as major -a -t "v" --releaseCommitMessageFormat "chore(release): v{{currentTag}}" && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:minor: standard-version --release-as minor -a -t "v" --releaseCommitMessageFormat "chore(release): v{{currentTag}}" && git push --follow-tags origin main
